name: v0.13.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Require minor version bump for Helm chart changes by @molepigeon in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/406
* Upgrade runc to v1.1.2 by @molepigeon in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/407
* Reformat CHANGELOG for consistency by @molepigeon in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/408
* Upgrade Go to 1.17.12 by @molepigeon in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/409
* testing refactor by @myoung34 in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/411
* changelog for v0.13.1 by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/414

## New Contributors
* @myoung34 made their first contribution in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/411

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/IBM/portieris/compare/v0.13.0...v0.13.1

name: v0.12.6
body:
## What's Changed
* Upgrade Go to 1.17.12 by @molepigeon in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/410
* bump versions for v0.12.6 by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/412
* release today by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/413


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/IBM/portieris/compare/v0.12.5...v0.12.6

name: v0.13.0
body:
summary in CHANGELOG.md

## What's Changed
* Bump github.com/docker/distribution from 2.7.1+incompatible to 2.8.0+incompatible by @dependabot in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/364
* Remove satori/go.uuid from project by @jhart1685 in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/367
* Issue 51: Solving retrieving OAuth token from repositories #2 by @v0lkc in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/363
* XPath notation by @SueGraham in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/381
* update to go1.17 by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/384
* Helm chart improvements by @gowrisankar22 in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/379
* remove mapping to non-existant notary/v1 service by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/386
* testing using retained IBM notary by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/387
* Removes cluster-admins group from SCC by @jusschwa-ibm in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/391
* Make CA cert definable by @jusschwa-ibm in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/389
* Make release selector optional by @jusschwa-ibm in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/397
* build with go1.17.10 by @sjhx in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/398

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/364
* @v0lkc made their first contribution in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/363
* @gowrisankar22 made their first contribution in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/379
* @jusschwa-ibm made their first contribution in https://github.com/IBM/portieris/pull/391

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/IBM/portieris/compare/v0.12.4...v0.13.0

name: v0.12.0
body: See CHANGELOG.md

name: v0.10.3
body: See CHANGELOG.md

This release sees the elimination of use of a number of beta resources in preparation for their removal in Kubernetes 1.22.
It is not possible to helm upgrade to this release because of the unusual webhook creation process we have used, please delete and reinstall. 
For other changes see the CHANGELOG.

name: v0.10.0
body:
See CHANGELOG.md

There is a breaking change in this release which requires that all policies are updated, see https://github.com/IBM/portieris/blob/master/POLICIES.md#apiversion-change

name: v0.9.5
body:
see CHANGELOG.md

N.B. `helm upgrade` to this release will fail on non openshift clusters due to the change to deployment of `serviceaccount`, `clusterrole` and `clusterrolebinding` which are now managed conventionally by Helm. Workaround: `helm delete`, `helm install`.
see CHANGELOG.md
Per CHANGELOG.md
metrics and bug fix release
The main feature is the addition of vulnerability check support (using IBM's registry service) and normalising the use of helm with respect to namespaces.
See CHANGELOG.md
See CHANGELOG.md
See CHANGELOG.md
addition of lookaside signature storage support with a consequent incompatible change to simple policies

name: Addition of simple signature verification
body: Extending the scope of policies and enforcement to include simple signing.
4fb991e1cf54dc0b988e0ec26a5f4d5cafb39c91 Allow users to define an additional CA (#39)

Improves certificate management for communicating with the Kubernetes API Server and adds support for user specified trust servers.

1a74a4e6b4964c044c640e298ee44df23d508755 Add support for icr.io (#38)
54c2af940a583ca0172e35e16b36098ca260fecf Move certs to kube secrets (#37)
46e9cd5ef06f98853ae3674a3f023108eeafad53 Rewrite image tests to not use ginkgo (#36)
8312baef08b2995877f7b635a6e1c64f33dd868d Document how to use specific trust server (#35)
abb86b3f1b204af2f003042cdf37322a5282f92b Allow user to specify trust server (#33)
